comment: Main body of Chinese text in vertical columns, enclosed within a black border. The text is written in traditional Chinese characters, arranged from right to left, top to bottom. There are marginal annotations on the right side, including '小百子七' (Small Hundred Sons Seven), '說文一至一' (Shuowen Volume One, Chapter One), and '嚴華' (Yan Hua), likely indicating edition or publisher details.
